mapper.select: select tech_num, tech_category, tech_title, user_id, ins_dt, upt_dt, hit from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tech_board tech_board_seq)*/ rownum rn, tech_num, tech_category, tech_title, user_id, ins_dt, upt_dt, hit from tech_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from tech_board where tech_num > 0
mapper.insert: insert into tech_board (tech_num, user_id, tech_category, tech_title, tech_con) values (tech_board_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{tech_category}, #{tech_title}, #{tech_con})

select tech_board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into tech_board (tech_num, user_id, tech_category, tech_title, tech_con) values (#{tech_num}, #{user_id}, #{tech_category}, #{tech_title}, #{tech_con})
mapper.update: update tech_board set tech_category = #{tech_category}, tech_title = #{tech_title}, tech_con = #{tech_con}, upt_dt = sysdate where tech_num = #{tech_num}
mapper.insert: insert into tech_comm (user_id, tech_num, comm_num, recomm_num, comm_con) values (#{user_id}, #{tech_num}, tech_comm_seq.nextval, 0, #{comm_con})
mapper.update: update tech_comm set comm_con = #{comm_con}, upt_dt = sysdate where comm_num = #{comm_num}
mapper.select: select user_id, tech_num, comm_num, recomm_num, comm_con, ins_dt, upt_dt from tech_comm where tech_num = #{tech_num} order by comm_num asc
